title:
Hello World!
We're Software for Social Good

markdown.headingText:
Hello World!
We're Software for Social Good
markdown.markdown:
::: {.hero-banner} ::: {.content-block} ::: {.hero-text} Here at VCU, students from multi-disciplinary backgrounds connect with outer communities through projects that create social benefit. ::: {.hero-buttons} [Learn more about us](){.btn .btn-primary .btn-lg role="button"} ::: ::: ::: {.hero-image-wrap} ![](assets/hero-image.png){.hero-image} ::: ::: ::: ::: {.our-pillars} ::: {.content-block} # Our Pillars ::: our-pillars-text Experiment, learn, design and develop - We provide a sandbox for students to uncover their true potential. [Join Us](){.btn .btn-primary .btn-lg role="button"} ::: ::: {.pillars-card-wrap} ::: {.pillars-card} ::: {.pillars-image-wrap} ![](assets/ssg_logo_black_l2.svg){.hero-image} :::

Hands-on Experience

Provide students with opportunities to work on real-world software challenges. ::: ::: {.pillars-card} ::: {.pillars-image-wrap} ![](assets/ssg_logo_black_l2.svg){.hero-image} :::

Innovative Solutions

Build innovative and creative softwares with a socially beneficial bottom line. ::: ::: {.pillars-card} ::: {.pillars-image-wrap} ![](assets/ssg_logo_black_l2.svg){.hero-image} :::

Talent Development

Discover emerging skills in the software design and development by working with us. ::: ::: ::: :::
